benefits of this exhibition: there are so many benefits from this expo for all, especially to students. Students can interact with other students So they can get ideas about their career and future. there are very usefull programs also scheduled for the students to guide them in correct path. Please Joint with us and make use of it.
Purpose of this exhibition: The ultimate purpose of this expo to express the quality of beecaas and its students. New students can get clear idea about standard of SLIATE in studies. it will be useful for them to join in SLIATE and make their way to success
about it Departments: SLIATE has so many departments IT department, Civil department , and more. it is giving opportunity for all kind of students to follow their higher studies
I T department is one of the leading department in SLIATE. it has lot of clever students and especially they have provided quality lecture panel
about lecturers: all departments have quality lecturers. all are from reputed state universities. they are Master degree holders. It is very good platform to students
about modules: Every department have several modules. They all based on foreign studies standard. It gives opportunity to students learn easily
